item.description:
In addition to continuing the intriguing discussions we had last month I'd like to spend a few minutes of this meetup collecting some of your opinions on what you would prefer this group to do. An excellent example of what I’m looking for is the comment Edward left in his feedback on the meetup “About” page.

Default location of Trident Cafe, 7:30 Feb. 8. Please post or email if this date/time or venue don't work for you.
item.name: The Boston Transhumanism February Meetup
